status.restricted-by-ip: You are not allowed to access from that IP address.
status.restricted-by-password: This audit result is password protected.
status.audit-not-found: The audit result you specified does not exist or already removed.

status.unscheduled: Schedule a scan session for the target.
status.scheduled: Please, wait until scheduled scan invoked.
status.failure: Failed to scan the target, you need to schedule a new scan session for the target.
status.unsafe: Critical vulnerabilities has been detected. Please make countermeasures against the vulnerabilities detected.
status.warning-aws: Permission needs to be requested to have authorization for scanning a target system on AWS.

scan.error-deletion: Failed to delete the scan session
scan.warning-aws-message:
Visit the following page with the AWS root account and get permission for scan.
And, inform {ip} as the source IP address for scan session.
https://aws.amazon.com/security/penetration-testing/

result.fill-reason: Fill in the reason not to implement correction against the vulnerabilities (remining {reminingLength} characters).

revocation.title: Revoke the page
revocation.message-1: You won't be able to access this page once you proceed this.
revocation.message-2: Are you sure to revoke this page?

contacts.title: Change contacts
contacts.message: Enter names and e-mail addresses of contacts.
contacts.name: Name
contacts.error-invalid-email: {email} is not a valid e-mail address

access-restriction.title: Access restriction
access-restriction.message: Configure the access control for this page.
access-restriction.error-invalid-password: Specify password that length is more than or equals to {minLength}

status.audit-not-found: Specified audit doesn't exist or has been removed.
status.target-is-private-ip: Private IP address is not allowed to specify.
status.target-is-not-fqdn-or-ipv4: Specified scan target is not a FQDN or an IP address.

audit-status-bar.submit-ready: Any critical vulnerabilities were not be found.
audit-status-bar.submit-completed: This audit result has been submitted.
audit-status-bar.critical-vulnerability-found: Critical vulnerabilities has been detected. You need to request the next scan session after the correction or inform the reason not to fix those vulnerabilities.
audit-status-bar.submit-failure: Failed to submit the audit result.
audit-status-bar.withdraw-failure: Failed to withdraw the audit result.
audit-status-bar.withdraw-confirmation: Are you sure to withdraw the submission of this audit result?
